title: Hobbit czyli tam i z powrotem
description: To kolejne wydanie wyczerpującego, kompleksowego przewodnika po języku JavaScript oraz jego najważniejszych klienckich i serwerowych interfejsach API

title: The Complete Dog Book
description: Utility class: An Obedience class for dogs who have won the tide Companion Dog Excellent (CDX). Utility Dog (UD): A title awarded to a dog that has been recorded a Utility Dog by the AKC as a result of having won certain minimum scores .

authors: Michael S. Garvey, Anne E. Hohenhaus
title: The Veterinarians' Guide to Your Dog's Symptoms
description: Avoiding Accidents An important thing for a dog owner to bear in mind is that no matter how smart a puppy or dog may be, she has no concept of potential danger, especially if she has lived in a protected environment all of her life.

title: Cats
description: Some insecticides are fatal if swallowed and cats constantly lick their coats. Never use on or near a cat, anything containing creosote, naphthalene, tar, phenol, carbolic acid, creolin, DDT or chlordane. Even a minute quantity of DDT.
